title: Chrome book
body: So i bought a brand new samsung chromebook and i was wondering if i can download lol with it. please help!

replies.body: Chromebooks are mostly made for low-end computing stuff like browsing the internet or possibly simple flash games, but it's not going to be able to run League, unfortunately. If you're looking to potentially get something to play League on, it'd be worthwhile to check out the [**minimum specs page**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654).
